_comment: NOTE: 'scenario' and 'expected_strategy' fields are for documentation/validation only. They are NOT passed to the AI agent and do NOT influence its decisions. The agent receives only: function_id, runtime_ms, memory_mb, instant_execution, description, data_input_gb, data_output_gb, source_location, invocations_per_day.

functions.name: API Health Check
functions.description: Simple REST API health check endpoint returning server status
functions.expected_strategy: Pick lowest carbon intensity (Sweden/Norway) - data transfer cost negligible

functions.name: Image Format Converter
functions.description: Convert images from PNG to WebP format for web optimization
functions.expected_strategy: Execute in us-east1 (same region) - transfer cost ($2.00 for 40GB) outweighs carbon benefit

functions.name: Cryptographic Key Generator
functions.description: Generate secure cryptographic keys using complex prime number algorithms
functions.expected_strategy: Carbon intensity matters most - choose Sweden/Norway despite transfer cost

functions.name: Video Transcoder
functions.description: Transcode 4K videos to multiple resolutions for adaptive streaming
functions.expected_strategy: Complex tradeoff - high invocation count makes transfer costs significant ($4.25 * 200 = $850/day)

functions.name: ML Image Classifier
functions.description: Run deep learning model for image classification using GPU acceleration
functions.expected_strategy: Limited to GPU regions (us-central1, us-east4, europe-west1, europe-west4) - pick cleanest among them

functions.name: Payment Processor
functions.description: Process credit card payments and return authorization response
functions.expected_strategy: Execute in best available region NOW - latency and availability trump optimization

functions.name: Monthly Report Generator
functions.description: Generate comprehensive monthly analytics reports from database
functions.expected_strategy: Wait for lowest carbon windows - single daily execution allows perfect timing

functions.name: Log Aggregator
functions.description: Aggregate and compress application logs for archival storage
functions.expected_strategy: Execute locally - massive data volume (120GB * 24 = 2,880 GB/day) makes transfer prohibitive

functions.name: Research Data Pipeline
functions.description: Process climate research datasets for university sustainability project
functions.expected_strategy: Choose cleanest region regardless of cost - Sweden/Norway/Quebec (hydro/nuclear power)

functions.name: GDPR User Data Processor
functions.description: Process EU user data with GDPR compliance requirements
functions.expected_strategy: Restrict to EU regions only - among compliant regions, choose lowest carbon (Sweden/Finland)
